comment: Siding + mapped from ERA ontology by Smart Data Models adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ERA/master/Siding/schema.json
description: Sidings are all those tracks where running trains in service movements ends and which are not used for operational routing of a train.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: demonstrationINF
contents.comment: EI declaration of demonstration for track/siding [INF]

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: gradient
contents.comment: Gradient for stabling tracks

contents.name: hasElectricShoreSupply
contents.comment: Existence of electric shore supply

contents.name: hasExternalCleaning
contents.comment: Existence of external cleaning facilities

contents.name: hasRefuelling
contents.comment: Existence of refuelling

contents.name: hasSandRestocking
contents.comment: Existence of sand restocking

contents.name: hasToiletDischarge
contents.comment: Existence of toilet discharge

contents.name: hasWaterRestocking
contents.comment: Existence of water restocking

contents.name: maxCurrentStandstillPantograph
contents.comment: Maximum current at standstill per pantograph

contents.name: minimumHorizontalRadius
contents.comment: Minimum radius of horizontal curve

contents.name: minimumVerticalRadius
contents.comment: Minimum radius of vertical curve

contents.name: minimumVerticalRadiusCrest
contents.comment: Minimum radius of vertical curve crest

contents.name: minimumVerticalRadiusHollow
contents.comment: Minimum radius of vertical curve hollow

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item

contents.name: sidingId
contents.comment: Identification of siding

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: tenClassification
contents.comment: TEN classification (of track, of platform, of siding)

contents.name: verificationINF
contents.comment: EC declaration of verification for track/siding [INF]

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
